question: ‘Women Transforming India Awards (WTI)’ is instituted by which organisation?
option3: Ministry of Women and Child Development
explanation:
The Women Entrepreneurship Platform of NITI Aayog is set to organise the Fourth Edition of the Women Transforming India Awards (WTI) on International Women’s Day (March 8).
The Women Transforming India Awards was instituted four years ago by NITI Aayog and are presented on the theme of ‘Women and Entrepreneurship’. Union Defence Minister Rajnath Singh will be the Chief Guest this year and will present the Women Transforming India Awards 2019.
